ftbpackcompanion.command.bypass.added: Added %s to the forced gamemode bypass list.
ftbpackcompanion.command.bypass.no-playe: No players are currently in the forced gamemode bypass list.
ftbpackcompanion.command.bypass.removed: Removed %s from the forced gamemode bypass list.
ftbpackcompanion.shaders_notice.no_shade: Shaders have been included in this pack but are disabled by default. Would you like to enable them? Shaders can be performance-intensive, cause issues with certain mods, and may not be compatible with your hardware.
If you'd like shaders, you can enable them here to experience the pack with a vibrant look and feel. If you encounter any issues, you can always disable them later in the video settings.
ftbpackcompanion.shaders_notice.title: Would you like to use shaders?
